Online mapping for beginners

A FREE ONLINE SESSION ORGANIZED BY CARTODB

Thank you for joining us at our first ever Mapping for Beginners class. This is the first of a multi-part series. You can stay up-to-date with events by following our blog, following us on Twitter, or watching our Academy homepage. Below you can find all the links and information you need.

Other material

This is only the tip of the iceberg as far as online mapping goes. If you want to keep using CartoDB to learn more skills, you can start doing so immediately by browsing our online tutorials section. After you get the knack of it, start looking at more advanced topics, including CartoDB.js, Leaflet, and Google Maps.
